channel.title: Comments on: Outlook.com totally messed me up

item.title: By: Hang
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.description:
Alright, I managed to solve the problem - it was actually in Account preference - EMail preference, then I deleted my @hotmail.com address from there, then back to Account, rename @outlook.com to @hotmail.com (there should be a short period of time that @hotmail.com address does not exist, be aware), then go back to email preference to delete @outlook.com.
!@#$%^&*()*&^&%^$%
item.content:encoded:
Alright, I managed to solve the problem – it was actually in Account preference – EMail preference, then I deleted my @hotmail.com address from there, then back to Account, rename @outlook.com to @hotmail.com (there should be a short period of time that @hotmail.com address does not exist, be aware), then go back to email preference to delete @outlook.com.

!@#$%^&*()*&^&%^$%
